name: Goofy Half-Life
summary: Are you bored with all these mods about realism, ever just wanted to get frags in the goofiest way, then Goofy Half-Life is for you! WARNING: This is a mod intended for those just looking to have some fun, if you are offended by poorly re-skinned models, or you are seeking a political career do NOT play this!! If your eyes should happen to come into contact with any of this material, rinse eyes three times with Bleach and scrub thoroughly with a Wire-brush. Afterwards proceed to gargle your mouth out with Ether, Then immediately contact your local physician.
